name: The Curse of Castle Dracula
story: The player is a vampire hunter who has infiltrated Count Dracula's castle to destroy the ancient vampire lord once and for all. The castle is filled with dark magic, undead servants, and deadly traps. The player must navigate through the castle's chambers, gather the tools needed to defeat Dracula, and confront the vampire in his lair before dawn breaks and he becomes too powerful to defeat.
opening_prompt:
The moon hangs full overhead as you stand before the massive iron gates of Castle Dracula.

%s

Your horse whinnies nervously behind you, sensing the evil that permeates this place. The castle looms before you, its Gothic spires piercing the night sky like dark fangs. 

Time is against you - you must find and destroy Dracula before the sun rises and he retreats to his hidden sanctum.

castle_gates.name: Castle Gates
castle_gates.description: Massive wrought iron gates stand before the imposing Gothic castle. The gates are slightly ajar, as if inviting you inside. Stone gargoyles perch atop the gate posts, their eyes seeming to follow your movements. A cobblestone path leads up to the castle's main entrance.

grand_foyer.name: Grand Foyer
grand_foyer.description: A cavernous entrance hall with a grand staircase sweeping upward into darkness. Dusty portraits of pale aristocrats line the walls, their eyes seeming to track your movement. Cobwebs drape from an enormous chandelier that hasn't been lit in decades. The air is thick with the smell of decay and old blood.

library.name: Library
library.description: Towering bookshelves filled with ancient tomes reach up to the vaulted ceiling. Many books appear to be written in Latin and other dead languages. A reading table sits in the center with several open books, their pages yellowed with age. The knowledge here could be invaluable to understanding Dracula's weaknesses.

laboratory.name: Laboratory
laboratory.description: A medieval laboratory filled with bubbling alchemical apparatus, preserved specimens in jars, and arcane symbols carved into stone tables. The air reeks of sulfur and decay. This appears to be where Dracula conducts his dark experiments.

dining_hall.name: Dining Hall
dining_hall.description: A long oak table dominates this room, set for a feast that was never eaten. The chairs are pushed back as if the diners fled in haste. Portraits of Dracula through the centuries hang on the walls, showing his unchanging face across hundreds of years. A massive fireplace holds cold ashes.

kitchen.name: Kitchen
kitchen.description: A medieval kitchen with a large hearth and hanging pots. The pantry shelves are stocked with strange preserved foods and bottles of unidentifiable liquids. A butcher's block bears dark stains that you prefer not to examine too closely.

master_bedroom.name: Master Bedroom
master_bedroom.description: An opulent bedroom with a four-poster bed draped in crimson velvet. The room feels unnaturally cold despite the ornate furnishings. A balcony overlooks the courtyard below. This appears to be Dracula's personal chambers, though his coffin is nowhere to be seen.

blocked_exits.east: Heavy wooden door is locked with an ornate silver key.

courtyard.name: Courtyard
courtyard.description: An overgrown courtyard surrounded by the castle walls. Dead trees twist toward the sky like gnarled fingers. A stone well sits in the center, its depths lost in darkness. The sound of bats echoes from somewhere above.

blocked_exits.down: You sense something evil below, but cannot find an entrance to the castle's depths.

crypt_entrance.name: Crypt Entrance
crypt_entrance.description: Stone steps lead down into the castle's crypt. The heavy door is sealed with mystical symbols that seem to writhe in the torchlight. A sense of ancient evil emanates from beyond the door.

blocked_exits.down: The crypt door is sealed with dark magic. You need the proper key and ritual components.

renfield.name: Renfield
renfield.description: Dracula's deranged human servant, dressed in tattered clothing. His eyes dart about wildly and he speaks in cryptic riddles. Despite his madness, he knows the castle's secrets and might aid you if approached correctly.

stone_gargoyle.name: Stone Gargoyle
stone_gargoyle.description: An ancient stone guardian that comes to life when threatened. Its eyes glow red and its claws are razor sharp. It guards important areas of the castle.

arrival.story: The player has just arrived at Castle Dracula and must gain entry and begin exploring. The castle's defenses are at their weakest, but time is running short until dawn.

dracula_materializes.prompt: Count Dracula suddenly MATERIALIZES from the shadows before you, his crimson eyes blazing with ancient hunger! He hisses menacingly: "You DARE disturb the ancient grimoire? You have awakened me from my slumber, and now I am STARVING!" The temperature drops precipitously as his dark presence fills the room. His fangs glisten in the candlelight.

lightning_strike.prompt: A MASSIVE LIGHTNING BOLT CRASHES DOWN from the storm-torn heavens!

wolves_appear.prompt: THREE ENORMOUS DIRE WOLVES suddenly emerge from the darkness beyond the castle gates!

bats_swarm.prompt: A MASSIVE SWARM of vampire bats suddenly ERUPTS from the castle's towers!

contingency_rules: Reading the vampire lore book adds it to inventory and provides knowledge about Dracula's weaknesses.
When a swarm of bats appears, set the var 'bats_swarmed' to 'true'.
When the player collects both the ancient grimoire and vampire lore book, the scene changes to 'preparation'.
If the ancient grimoire and vampire lore book are both in inventory, the scene changes to 'preparation'.
Speaking to Renfield reveals the location of the secret passage to the crypt.
When the player opens or reads the ancient grimoire, set the variable 'opened_grimoire' to 'true'.
When Dracula materializes, appears, or physically is in the location with the player, set the var 'dracula_appeared' to 'true'.

preparation.story: The player has gained crucial knowledge about vampire weaknesses and must now gather the specific tools needed to face Dracula. The vampire's power grows as dawn approaches.

renfield.name: Renfield
renfield.description: Renfield seems more coherent now, as if your presence has partially broken Dracula's hold over him. He speaks more clearly about the master's weaknesses.

courtyard.name: Courtyard
courtyard.description: An overgrown courtyard surrounded by the castle walls. Dead trees twist toward the sky like gnarled fingers. A stone well sits in the center, its depths lost in darkness. The sound of bats echoes from somewhere above. You now know of the entrance to the castle's depths.

crypt_entrance.name: Crypt Entrance
crypt_entrance.description: Stone steps lead down into the castle's crypt. The heavy door is sealed with mystical symbols that seem to writhe in the torchlight. A sense of ancient evil emanates from beyond the door.

secret_passage.name: Secret Passage
secret_passage.description: A narrow stone passage hidden behind a tapestry in the master bedroom. Ancient symbols are carved into the walls, and the air grows colder as you descend. This passage leads directly to Dracula's sanctum.

contingency_rules: When the player has the crypt key and blessed wooden stake, the crypt entrance becomes accessible.
If the crypt key and blessed wooden stake are both in inventory, the crypt entrance becomes accessible.
Combining silver dagger, holy water, and garlic essence creates a 'consecrated silver blade' in inventory.
When the player enters the secret passage or crypt entrance with proper equipment, the scene changes to 'confrontation'.
If the player has the proper equipment and enters the secret passage or crypt entrance, the scene changes to 'confrontation'.

confrontation.story: The player has reached Dracula's sanctum and must face the vampire lord in final combat. Dawn is breaking, and Dracula's power is at its peak.

draculas_sanctum.name: Dracula's Sanctum
draculas_sanctum.description: A vast underground chamber carved from living rock. Ancient sarcophagi line the walls, and at the center sits an ornate black coffin lined with Transylvanian soil. The air thrums with dark power, and shadows seem to move independently of their sources. This is the heart of Dracula's power.

count_dracula.name: Count Dracula
count_dracula.description: The legendary vampire count appears as a tall, pale aristocrat in formal evening wear. His eyes burn like crimson coals and his smile reveals gleaming fangs. Despite his refined appearance, an aura of ancient evil and immense power surrounds him.

contingency_rules: If the player attacks Dracula without the consecrated silver blade or blessed wooden stake, the attack fails and the game ends with the player's defeat.
When the player successfully wounds Dracula with consecrated weapons, he transforms into a bat and attempts to flee.
If the player destroys Dracula's coffin while he is wounded, Dracula is destroyed and the player wins.
If dawn breaks (after several turns in the sanctum) without Dracula being defeated, he becomes too powerful and the game ends in defeat.
Reading any book in the library takes time and advances the approaching dawn.
If the player tries to leave the castle before confronting Dracula, they encounter wolves that force them back inside.
Using holy water on vampiric creatures causes them to flee or be destroyed.
If the player's health falls too low during combat, they can retreat to recover but lose precious time.
Breaking mirrors in the castle releases trapped souls who may aid the player with information.
game_end_prompt: Evaluate the player's success in their vampire hunting mission. Did they gather the proper knowledge and tools? Did they show courage in facing the supernatural threats? Did they successfully destroy Dracula, or did they fall victim to the ancient vampire's power? Consider their strategic thinking, bravery, and preparation in your assessment.
